text: I'm especially excited for my good friends @JusticeWillett & Jim Ho, who @JohnCornyn & I recommended to @POTUS for judgeships in #TX. I'm grateful the Senate took swift action to confirm these two principled constitutionalists to the bench & help set this incredible record.

California has been affected by some of the worst wildfires to record. If your home has been impacted by the October wildfires, stay up to date on the progress of fire debris removal in your community by visiting this online tracking tool: http://www.spk.usace.army.mil/CAwildfire/.
I am proud to serve on the @SenJudiciary where I worked to get all of these excellent nominees get confirmed. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRIJgkoXcAAfEJf.png

This past Monday, President Trump signed #FY18NDAA into law, and I am proud that 13 of the amendments I sponsored & co-sponsored were included. These amendments will directly benefit Texas and our military interests both abroad and in space. -> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=3542

Working with the City of Corpus Christi, I presented an amendment to enable the city to conduct a land transfer w the @USNavy, addressing concerns of potential population growth that may impact the integrity of Naval Air Station Corpus Christi.

There are only a few hours left to sign up for health care. Please sign up at http://healthcare.gov.

Most people who enroll in a health care plan can find plans for $50 to $100 per month. Free, professional assistance is also available: 1-800-318-2596 and online. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRIEis2V4AAP6j8.jpg

Important. Spread the word. #GetCovered
https://twitter.com/HealthCareGov/status/941725573755187200 QT @HealthCareGov It's busy at our call center today! If you call and are asked to leave your name and phone number, please do so. A call center rep will call you back after Dec 15 to make sure you have Marketplace coverage that starts Jan 1. You may also visit http://HealthCare.gov to enroll.

Healthy people can become sick people in the blink of an eye. Get yourself and your family covered for the new year by signing up at http://healthcare.gov. Don’t delay — open enrollment ends today (CA has until January 31). #GetCovered

I was proud to partner with Senator @DickDurbin on legislation to ensure immigrant military personnel are allowed to continue to serve until their background screenings are completed — and this week, it became law. 
https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/checkpoint/wp/2017/12/12/massive-military-spending-bill-provision-reduces-deportation-risk-for-immigrant-recruits/?utm_term=.817b922dcc8c

The increased Child Tax Credit, along with the strong pro-growth, pro-American jobs provisions already contained in the legislation, makes me an enthusiastic YES vote for the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Thank you to @MikeLeeforUtah, @votetimscott and @IvankaTrump for their leadership. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRIfJaSUIAAnDVj.jpg

Another #TX win- my amendment to prioritize housing for enlisted personnel. Our service members shouldn't be forced to live in substandard barracks or military housing; a service member’s quality of life has a direct impact on their effectiveness- impacting our nation’s readiness
